nodes.text: Clone medical officers, also known as medical officer clones, were clone troopers specialized in medical treatments. They served aboard Haven-class medical stations and other starships during the Clone Wars.

They wore a similar uniform to the clone navigation officer. During the early stages of the Clone Wars, the uniform was white with an insignia on their left arm, later adding red stripes to the sides of the uniform and moving the insignia to the chest.
The clone medical officers first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode Shadow of Malevolence, but were not identified in canon until the book Ultimate Star Wars.
